markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Megalania](/Monsters.aspx?ID=725)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Megalanias, like their smaller cousins the giant monitor lizards, strike fast and use their powerful bite to grip their prey. They prefer to swallow their prey whole rather than risk others getting a bite of a hard-won meal.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Lizard_Megalania.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Megalania](/Monsters.aspx?ID=725)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +15; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 60 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 125

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +18 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+9 piercing plus Grab and megalania venom

**Megalania Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 3, and flat-footed (1 round)

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)**  ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Large, 2d10+7 bludgeoning, Rupture 16

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-70" />
name: Megalania
